attributes.action: stop wasting house of commons time with media issues when their are more important items to debate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel that the house of commons is no place for media issues to be discussed. 
With the current issues relating to the global recession surely the House of Commons could spend their time with more important national issues. The current issue of BBC presenters is a storm in a tea cup when compared to these national/international issues.
